column4: anyone know what to do if the install cd cant resize your partitions? i dont want to remove my windows partition

so, will it be possible to reinstall windows at a later time?

way easier to do Windows first, since Ubuntu can then resize it and do the dual-boot
if you want to do Ubuntu first though, you should resize your Ubuntu partitions with GParted (System>Administration>Gnome Partition Editor on the Ubuntu LiveCD) then fix Grub
